snippet.title: Marvel’s Midnight Suns - Meet Morbius | Hero Spotlight
snippet.description:
Anyone else craving blood today? Just Morbius? 🦇

Help Morbius quench his Bloodlust and stop the vampyre threat with The Hunger DLC, now available for Midnight Suns.

Expand your adventure with Morbius in The Hunger, the third DLC for Marvel’s Midnight Suns. Morbius joins the team to combat the vampyre threat and satisfy his Bloodlust, bringing with him 11 unique Hero abilities. Plus, enjoy new story missions, a brand new Abbey Upgrade, and some fresh cosmetics for the Living Vampire!

Launch your epic adventure with the legendary #MidnightSuns TODAY!

► Purchase the Legendary Edition to receive the Season Pass containing Morbius, Deadpool, Venom & Storm: https://2kgam.es/3TGGad6

► Watch the Prequel Shorts Intro Teaser: https://youtu.be/k9IPmCKu7qI
► Join the Official Marvel’s Midnight Suns Newsletter and get the exclusive Blade Nightstalker Skin: https://2kgam.es/Nightstalker
► Learn more about the Midnight Suns: https://2kgam.es/3Qdk2V1
-------------------------------------------------
Follow Marvel’s Midnight Suns
-------------------------------------------------
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/midnightsuns
Twitter: https://www.twitter.com/midnightsuns
Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/midnightsuns
YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/midnightsuns

#DarknessFalls #MidnightSuns
